name: 2024 The 7th International Conference on Educational Technology Management
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1746-8), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.(\*All the previous Conference Proceedings have been published by ACM, archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.)
